sense.def:
To sniff
pomeni glasno vdihniti zrak skozi nos, na primer takrat, ko smo prehlajeni, ko se zadržujemo, da ne bi jokali, ali ko želimo pokazati neodobravanje.

seg.quote: Felicity said, sniffing, ‘When will you see me again?’
The classroom rang with coughs, sniffs, and sneezes.

sense.def:
To sniff something
pomeni glasno vdihniti zrak v bližini nečesa, da bi ugotovili vonj ali vsebino tistega.

seg.quote: ‘What a revolting smell,’ he said, sniffing the air.
The dog sniffed at Marsha's bags.
